question: You came to know about a piece of equipment that would help you at your workplace. Write a letter to your manager. In your letter– describe the equipment– explain how it might be useful at your workplace– offer help in purchasing it
text: I am writing this letter in connection to the new sanitiser machine which is available in the market that could be of great help to the team members. I believe this equipment could help the crew to clean the lobby area within a matter of seconds.

This machine has ultra-violet light and a self-sanitizing water sprayer head which  kills and cleans bacteria and viruses in a few seconds. It comes in a pack of two, which can be replaced every two years. The new gadget also has 1 year extended warranty from the date of purchase.

The new sanitiser equipment could help the front of the house and bakers to sanitize the workplace according to our company policy. It could help us to avoid allergies due to the existing bucket filling method.

Anyway, I could like to suggest ways to purchase the new gadget. We could use the TMAG funds which have not been used since 2020 due to the covid -19. In addition, we can collect funds from the crew as it is beneficial for everyone who is involved.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
